title: Old Building 2nd block off Galle Rd in Wellawatte
details: Old 3 story building with over 5,000 sq ft of usable space being sold at land value. Spread out over 23.5 perches and with a road front of approximately 55 feet, this property is just a few steps from the Galle Road in Welllawatte. There is direct view of the property from the Galle road as the first block is an open parking lot. Priced to sell at land value only. Asking price is Rs. 11m per perch. Call now for an appointment.
